com.brightcove.player.media.tasks

Class FindVideoTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.net.URI,java.lang.Void,org.json.JSONObject>
      • com.brightcove.player.media.tasks.FindMediaTask
        • com.brightcove.player.media.tasks.FindVideoTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    @Emits(events={})
@ListensFor(events={})
public class FindVideoTask
extends FindMediaTask
implements Component
    Task to find a single Video by Video ID or Reference ID. Emits a EventType.DID_FIND_VIDEO when complete.
